participant_1.background:
I was raised in the mountains, where I learned to ski at a young age.
On the weekend I like to go to the beach to relax and have fun.
i know how to drive a stickshift.
i love starbucks coffee.
I have been single for a while now and enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.

participant_2.background:
I love the memories of my senior prom and how happy I was that day.
I like to catch up on my reading about business and finance on a rainy day.
i have depression and anxiety so i don t really go out a lot.
My next challenge is to skydive because I need to keep pushing my limits and I love the adrenaline.
i am a cheerleader.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking. I am a little bit nervous because I am going to skydive later today.
That sounds exciting! I have never skydived before. What made you decide to do it?
I have always been a thrill seeker and I love the adrenaline rush. I also think it will be a really cool experience.
I bet it will be. I am sure you will love it.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach, read, and watch movies. I also love to cheerlead.
The beach sounds nice. I love to go swimming and sunbathe.
Me too! I love the feeling of the sun on my skin.
What do you like to read about?
I like to read about business and finance. I am thinking about going to school for business.
That sounds like a good idea. I am sure you would do well in business.
What do you like to do for work?
I am a waitress right now, but I am hoping to get a job in business soon.
That sounds like a good goal. I am sure you will be able to find a job in business.
